description: They say a picture on it's own is worth a thousand words, but I feel that's an understatement. Words could never match the awe inspiring beauty that the world has to offer. Hi, I'm Shawn; a simple easy going guy that looks at the world like there's still magic in it. Music is my forte as well as my bread and butter. And just as it is a photographers job is to look for the most beautiful things out there and capture them, that’s exactly what I intend to do. I’m searching for my Mona Lisa who I’m sure is waiting out there in The Starry Night looking for me as I am for her.
